-- retrieveRlabTestEqipPrctMgmtList 기기 > 관리 > 신뢰성평가장비 예약관리 목록조회 SELECT INFO.MCHN_CL_CD AS mchnClCd ,ACC.COM_DTL_NM AS comDtlNm ,PRCT.MCHN_PRCT_ID AS mchnPrctId ,PRCT.PRCT_TITL AS prctTitl ,INFO.MCHN_HAN_NM AS mchnHanNm ,PRCT.RGST_TEAM_CD AS rgstTeamCd --,PRCT.RGST_TEAM_NM 팀명 ,PRCT.RGST_ID AS rgstId ,SU2.SA_NAME AS rgstNm ,CASE WHEN INFO.MCHN_CL_CD='03' THEN PRCT.PRCT_DT +' ~ '+ PRCT.PRCT_DT ELSE PRCT.PRCT_FROM_DT+' ~ '+ PRCT.PRCT_TO_DT END AS prctFromToDt ,PRCT.PRCT_FROM_DT AS prctFromDt ,PRCT.PRCT_TO_DT AS prctToDt ,CASE WHEN INFO.MCHN_CL_CD='03' THEN PRCT.PRCT_FROM_TIM + ' ~ ' + PRCT.PRCT_TO_TIM END as prctFromToTim ,PRCT.PRCT_FROM_TIM AS prctFromTim ,PRCT.PRCT_TO_TIM AS prctToTim ,PRCT.PRCT_SCN_CD AS prctScnCd ,ACC2.COM_DTL_NM AS prctScnNm ,INFO.MCHN_CRGR_ID AS mchnCrgrId ,SU.SA_NAME AS mchnCrgrNm FROM IRIS_RLAB_MCHN_PRCT_MST PRCT INNER JOIN IRIS_RLAB_MCHN_INFO_MGMT INFO ON PRCT.MCHN_INFO_ID=INFO.MCHN_INFO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU ON INFO.MCHN_CRGR_ID = SU.SA_SABUN_NEW LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU2 ON PRCT.RGST_ID = SU2.SA_SABUN_NEW INNER JOIN IRIS_ADM_COM_CD ACC ON INFO.MCHN_CL_CD=ACC.COM_DTL_CD INNER JOIN IRIS_ADM_COM_CD ACC2 ON PRCT.PRCT_SCN_CD=ACC2.COM_DTL_CD WHERE 1=1 AND PRCT.DEL_YN='N' AND INFO.DEL_YN='N' AND ACC.DEL_YN='N' AND ACC2.DEL_YN='N' AND ACC.COM_CD_CD='RLAB_CL_CD' AND ACC2.COM_CD_CD='MCHN_APPR_RQ_ST'
AND PRCT.PRCT_TITL LIKE '%'+#{prctTitl}+'%'
AND ( INFO.MCHN_HAN_NM LIKE '%'+#{mchnNm}+'%' OR INFO.MCHN_EN_NM LIKE '%'+#{mchnNm}+'%' )
AND SU.SA_NAME LIKE '%'+#{rgstNm}+'%'
AND PRCT.PRCT_SCN_CD = #{prctScnCd}
AND INFO.MCHN_CL_CD = #{rlabClCd}
ORDER BY PRCT.MCHN_PRCT_ID DESC

-- retrieveRlabTestEqipPrctDtl 기기관리 상세 조회 SELECT INFO.MCHN_CL_CD AS mchnClCd ,ACC.COM_DTL_NM AS comDtlNm ,PRCT.MCHN_PRCT_ID AS mchnPrctId ,PRCT.PRCT_TITL AS prctTitl ,INFO.MCHN_HAN_NM AS mchnHanNm ,INFO.MCHN_EN_NM AS mchnEnNm ,PRCT.RGST_TEAM_CD AS rgstTeamCd --,PRCT.RGST_TEAM_NM 팀명 ,PRCT.RGST_ID AS rgstId ,SU.SA_NAME AS rgstNm ,SU.SA_DEPT_NAME AS teamNm ,SU.SA_MAIL AS rgstMail ,PRCT.SMPO_NM AS smpoNm ,PRCT.SMPO_QTY AS smpoQty ,PRCT.PRCT_DT AS prctDt ,PRCT.TEST_SPCE_CD AS testSpceCd ,PRCT.TEST_CND01 + ' ~ ' + TEST_CND02 AS testCnd ,PRCT.CYCL_FLAG AS cyclFlag ,CASE WHEN INFO.MCHN_CL_CD='03' THEN PRCT.PRCT_FROM_TIM + ' ~ ' + PRCT.PRCT_TO_TIM END as prctFromToTim ,PRCT.PRCT_FROM_DT AS prctFromDt ,PRCT.PRCT_TO_DT AS prctToDt ,CASE WHEN INFO.MCHN_CL_CD='03' THEN PRCT.PRCT_DT +' '+ PRCT.PRCT_FROM_TIM + ' ~ ' + PRCT.PRCT_TO_TIM ELSE PRCT.PRCT_FROM_DT+' ~ '+ PRCT.PRCT_TO_DT END AS prctFromToDt ,PRCT.PRCT_FROM_TIM AS prctFromTim ,PRCT.PRCT_TO_TIM AS prctToTim ,PRCT.PRCT_SCN_CD AS prctScnCd ,ACC2.COM_DTL_NM AS prctScnNm ,INFO.MCHN_CRGR_ID AS mchnCrgrId ,SU2.SA_NAME AS mchnCrgrNm FROM IRIS_RLAB_MCHN_PRCT_MST PRCT INNER JOIN IRIS_RLAB_MCHN_INFO_MGMT INFO ON PRCT.MCHN_INFO_ID=INFO.MCHN_INFO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU2 ON INFO.MCHN_CRGR_ID = SU2.SA_SABUN_NEW LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU ON PRCT.RGST_ID = SU.SA_SABUN_NEW INNER JOIN IRIS_ADM_COM_CD ACC ON INFO.MCHN_CL_CD=ACC.COM_DTL_CD INNER JOIN IRIS_ADM_COM_CD ACC2 ON PRCT.PRCT_SCN_CD=ACC2.COM_DTL_CD WHERE 1=1 AND PRCT.DEL_YN='N' AND INFO.DEL_YN='N' AND ACC.DEL_YN='N' AND ACC2.DEL_YN='N' AND ACC.COM_CD_CD='RLAB_CL_CD' AND ACC2.COM_CD_CD='MCHN_APPR_RQ_ST' AND PRCT.MCHN_PRCT_ID = #{mchnPrctId}
